mapper.select: SELECT B.seq , A.seq AS optionSeq , A.item_seq AS itemSeq , A.option_name AS optionName , A.show_flag AS showFlag , A.mod_date AS modDate , A.reg_date AS regDate , B.option_seq AS optionSeq , B.value_name AS valueName , B.stock_cnt AS stockCount , B.stock_flag AS stockFlag , B.option_price AS optionPrice , B.sale_price AS salePrice , B.sale_period AS salePeriod FROM sm_item_option A INNER JOIN sm_item_option_value B ON A.seq=B.option_seq WHERE 1=1 AND item_seq=#{value} ORDER BY A.seq ASC, B.seq ASC
SELECT seq , item_seq AS itemSeq , option_name AS optionName , show_flag AS showFlag , mod_date AS modDate , reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_item_option WHERE 1=1 AND item_seq=#{value} ORDER BY seq ASC

SELECT seq , option_seq AS optionSeq , value_name AS valueName , stock_cnt AS stockCount , stock_flag AS stockFlag , option_price AS optionPrice , sale_price AS salePrice , sale_period AS salePeriod , mod_date AS modDate , reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_item_option_value WHERE 1=1 AND option_seq=#{value} ORDER BY seq ASC
